push_events.description: Event will be triggered by a push to the repository

issue_events.description: Event will be triggered when an issue is created/updated/closed

confidential_issue_events.description: Event will be triggered when a confidential issue is created/updated/closed

merge_request_events.description: Event will be triggered when a merge request is created/updated/merged

note_events.description: Event will be triggered when someone adds a comment

tag_push_events.description: Event will be triggered when a new tag is pushed to the repository

build_events.description: Event will be triggered when a build status changes

wiki_page_events.description: Event will be triggered when a wiki page is created/updated
